title: Hands on with the Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Pro series
content:
Samsung has officially announced the Galaxy Book 2 series, not to be confused with the Snapdragon 850-powered Galaxy Book 2 from a few years ago. Consisting of the Galaxy Book 2 Pro, Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360, Galaxy Book 2 360, and Galaxy Book 2 Business, Samsung kept the best of last year’s models (mostly),

The post Hands on with the Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Pro series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung's Galaxy Book 2 Pro series has AMOLED displays, super-light designs, big touchpads, and more, and we got to go hands on with them.
